assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Oyak Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. provides research, brokerage, portfolio management, corporate finance, and fund operation services for the capital market instruments in Turkey and internationally. It offers research services, such as analysis, forecasts, and recommendations to investors on capital market instruments and other investment opportunities; brokerage services, including stock exchange brokerage, fixed income securities, BIST futures and options market transactions, over-the-counter derivative transactions, and investment funds transactions; and portfolio management and investment advisory services. The company also provides corporate finance services comprising mergers and acquisitions, debt/stock configuration, initial public offering, debt instrument issuing, and financial consulting; and fund operation services. It serves finance, insurance, energy, telecommunications, food, fertilizer, mining, port, real estate, retail, media, iron and steel, cement, logistics, chemical, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Oyak Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. is a subsidiary of Ordu Yardimlasma Kurumu.
